Bitcoin Smart(BCS) is a hard fork of Bitcoin on block height 505050.With integration of smart-contract system, new features such as token issuance will be available and onchain performance will no longer be a issue.

Digital Asset Issuance

everyone is able to issue an own token.

Smart Contract

support DAPP development

Token Fluidity

all issued token will be automaticly listed on decentlized exchange.

Transation Efficiency

scalable, Instant Transactions.

Mainnet

will be hard-forked in

505050...loading blocks

FAQ

Bitcoin Smart(BCS) is an experiment to improve Bitcoin , with integration of smart-contract, new features such as token issuance will be available on Bitcoin and onchain performance will no longer be a issue.
Bitcoin smart test token (BCST) is a sample token for experiment and it will shows how the token issuance system works.
You will get 100 Bitcoin Smart(BCS) and 100 Bitcoin smart test token (BCST).
No. All BCS will either be distributed to original BTC holder, or mined by public miner.
A decentlized exchange will be available and all issued token on BCS network will be automatic listed on the exchange for at least 1 trading pair. For example, if you run a pizzeria, you can issue a pizza coin (PIZ) in system then a PIZ/BCS trading pairs will be autoamatic created in the exchange. A token is valuable only if the issuer have interests or rights connect with the token. In this case, you can either share some profit to token holder, or allow use token to redeem pizza in restaurant.
